values: Let the Peoples Praise You, O God, Let All the Peoples Praise You!Let the Peoples Praise You, O God, Let All the Peoples Praise You!

Missions exists because the knowledge of God, the praise of God, the enjoyment of God, and the fear of God don’t exist among the nations.Missions exists because the knowledge of God, the praise of God, the enjoyment of God, and the fear of God don’t exist among the nations.
